text: Shipped verbatim content layer with source provenance tracking
Added diff test script—now I can catch content drift automatically
whatChangedMyMind: Thought automated content checks were overkill. Then I manually compared strings for an hour.

text: Built the media timeline with year navigation
Redesigned collection modal—less clutter, more breathing room
whatChangedMyMind: I kept adding info to the modal. Then stripped it back. The restraint is the design.

Wrote 10 question notes on 'starting something new'
whatChangedMyMind: Thought I'd do 3 notes. Once I started, the connections kept coming.

Added Lexington 250 to experiments—feels good to document shipped work

whatChangedMyMind: Started to add 20 items. Realized curation > quantity. Kept 12.

text: Deployed first version of the site—nervous but excited
Chose terracotta as secondary accent—Bauhaus Dessau inspiration
whatChangedMyMind: Almost went with blue. Then saw photos of the Dessau building. Terracotta it is.
